Reviews.Title: “Good service”
Reviews.Author: SA2603
Reviews.Content: reception staff friendly tried accomadate quickly considering arrived hotel 7am tiring flight fron south africa clean spacious food prepared delivered late night music night clubs hotel safe happy stay hotel dubai

Reviews.Title: “Our 5 day stay at hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rahul G
Reviews.Content: nice hotel situated nice location ie metro station nearby junction station yourself city avoid 1st floor coz late night music interrupt ears extremely supportive cooperative staff am satisfied hotel

Reviews.Title: “dubai experience”
Reviews.Author: fionnuala_7
Reviews.Content: husband travelled dubai january embarking cruise persian gulf staying fortune grand night boarding liner arrived 800 am flight heathrow unfortunately available time morning able leave luggage found staff hotel courteous adequate situated quiet areathe bed comfortable breakfast following morning standard wide range food hotel located town region dubai meant taxi dubai mall underground located near hotel found fantastic method transport dirhams travel day pass buses safe travelled yes flight path dubai airport hear planes night

Reviews.Title: “Julie F”
Reviews.Author: Julie F
Reviews.Content: stayed dec 2011 clean reception staff unhelpful food poor little choice couldnt sleep night directly flight path plus night club bars playing loud music 3 am morning glad staying couple nights checked

Reviews.Title: “nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Amine M
Reviews.Content: it´s worse 4 stars hotel i´ve chinese loud nightclub sleep worse food halfboard dont breakfast terrible nightmare staff hospitable nice

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service, quality, cleanliness, breakfast, rooms and especially sleep quality!”
Reviews.Author: Ahmed A
Reviews.Content: firstly dont pictures deceive dont reviews deceive especially sleep kettle iron basic towels cleanliness terrible bath clogged dirty moved 3 baths smelt sewer tap breakfast bad orange juice pineapple juice sour didnt clean tables theres limited space limited food taste brought orange juice tasted pure water pancakes yellow dont sockets alcohol main hear music 9pm 330am main couldnt sleep 112 212 316 opposite floor 3 hear music didnt sleep night club provided terrible sleeping quality morning found manager help moved hotel literally 2 minutes suite extra charge ill add 1 star service rate manager id rate 5 helped found alternative 20minutes bags car left terrible accommodation

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel for people who understand what hoteling is”

Reviews.Content: dear update experience regarding hotel recently november forced stay hotel following reasons check hour 1 called hotel available check inthey confirmed 930 reached mistaken available 2 accepted policy mind waiting 2the time alloted found smoky smell floor hotel claims denied stay offered floor wait 1 hour untill 3 pm claimed wifi free hotelso confirm wifi business traveler check alli technical person realized hotel short bandwidth capacity people using offer manager check refused rectify problemi technical guy told untill buy routers increase bandwidth week pathetic except indian girl pathetic sort staff patience tolerance level hospitality guy won fight claimed zero bill refund agent booked hoteland check 4 pm 8 lobby hell dont allow visitors meet upto mark day destroyed coz untrained zero level staffi suggest guys hotels cant ranked 1 star palace hotel deluxe decorated feel home lobby cleanliness nice level stay standard accomodate besides burjuman shoping mall metro clubbing choices including indian dance club dance night club uploading pics regent palace section regent palace hotel recommended 4 star budget sheraton deira hotel dhow palace hotel sheraton landmark hotel rotana rose ryan rotana

Reviews.Title: “Really not a good choice”
Reviews.Author: Soheileee
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days ready 3 pm forced wait 3 hours worst receptionists didnt pay attention situation whenever didnt ok sir example didnt sandals clock staffs behavior annoying impolite
